/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. Cars of various colors are scattered across the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
